notes:
Boss monster that sometimes spawns on [[Rookgaard]], introduced in [[Updates/8.5|Summer Update 2009]].

name: Rottie the Rotworm
behaviour: Weaker than a [[Rotworm]]. Does not push objects nor kill weaker creatures. It is not immune to earth, therefore you can kill it with poison arrows.
location: May spawn in the [[Poison Spider]] cave or in the [[Katana Quest]] on [[Rookgaard]]. Seems to spawn often but for short periods of time.
strategy: This creature is very similar to [[Rotworm]].
